question: Which Indian weightlifter has won Gold in 81 kg category at the 2019 Commonwealth Championships in Apia?
explanation: On 12th July 2019, Indian weightlifter Ajay Singh has won Gold in 81 kg category at the Commonwealth Championships in Apia, city of Samoa. He  has also created a new Commonwealth record in the clean and jerk category by lifting more than double his body weight (190kg) to score vital points at the Olympic qualifying event.  He also smashed the national record in the same category.  The other Indian in the 81kg category, Papul Changmai clinched the silver medal by lifting a total of 313kgs.
